text: Poplar DLR station serves Poplar, London. It is a station on the Docklands Light Railway in Travelcard Zone 2. It is a served by four of the five routes of the DLR. Thus it is the busiest station on the network in terms of services. ==Gallery== Image:Poplar DLR Station.jpg|Overview of the platforms looking east from glass-walled footbridge Image:DLR 106.jpg|New DLR train at Poplar station ==References== ==Other websites== *Docklands Light Railway website - Poplar station page *Map of Poplar, 1885. * Photograph of one of the platforms at Poplar Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:London Travelcard zone 2 Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets
title: Poplar DLR station
